title: ApplicationSyncRequest is a request to apply the config state to live state

retryStrategy.title: RetryStrategy contains information about the strategy to apply when a sync failed

backoff.title: Backoff is the backoff strategy to use on subsequent retries for failing syncs

duration.title: Duration is the amount to back off. Default unit is seconds, but could also be a duration (e.g. "2m", "1h")

factor.title: Factor is a factor to multiply the base duration after each failed retry

maxDuration.title: MaxDuration is the maximum amount of time allowed for the backoff strategy

limit.description: Limit is the maximum number of attempts for retrying a failed sync. If set to 0, no retries will be performed.

strategy.title: SyncStrategy controls the manner in which a sync is performed

apply.title: SyncStrategyApply uses `kubectl apply` to perform the apply

force.description:
Force indicates whether or not to supply the --force flag to `kubectl apply`.
The --force flag deletes and re-create the resource, when PATCH encounters conflict and has
retried for 5 times.

hook.description:
SyncStrategyHook will perform a sync using hooks annotations.
If no hook annotation is specified falls back to `kubectl apply`.

syncStrategyApply.title: SyncStrategyApply uses `kubectl apply` to perform the apply

force.description:
Force indicates whether or not to supply the --force flag to `kubectl apply`.
The --force flag deletes and re-create the resource, when PATCH encounters conflict and has
